name: Arboliva
description: The Olive Pokémon. This calm Pokémon is very compassionate. It will share its delicious, nutrient-rich oil with weakened Pokémon.

abilities.name: Seed Sower
abilities.description: When hit by a damaging attack, this Pokémon may use its reaction to use the Grassy Terrain move. The Pokémon does not need to know this move, and it costs no PP to use.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: At the end of this Pokémon's turn, if it used a berry, roll 1d4. On a result of 3 or 4, it regains that berry as a held item.
